intro_top.title: Individual Therapy
intro_top.description: We offer psychiatric consultations dedicated to diagnosing and treating various mental disorders and provide pharmacological support if necessary. Our psychotherapy for children and adolescents focuses on adapting therapy to individual needs and challenges to support healthy psychological and emotional development.

items.title: Psychiatric Consultation
items.description: We offer psychiatric consultations dedicated to diagnosing and treating various mental disorders and provide pharmacological support if necessary. Our psychotherapy for children and adolescents focuses on adapting therapy to individual needs and challenges to support healthy psychological and emotional development.

items.title: Online Psychotherapy
items.description: Within online psychotherapy, we offer convenient and flexible therapy sessions, enabling access to therapeutic support from anywhere. Our couples therapy focuses on improving communication, building bonds, and resolving conflicts in the relationship. Family therapy helps in creating healthier relationships and better understanding mutual needs.

items.title: Psychotherapy for Neurodiverse Individuals (ADHD, Autism, etc.)
items.description: For neurodiverse individuals, such as those with ADHD or autism, we offer specialized psychotherapy tailored to their unique needs and ways of functioning. In our sexological consultations, we can help resolve sexual problems and support healthy sexuality and intimacy.

items.title: Cognitive-Behavioral Therapy
items.description: Within cognitive-behavioral therapy, we focus on changing thoughts and behaviors leading to improved mental functioning. Our humanistic/Gestalt therapy is based on trust in the client's inner wisdom and promotes self-awareness and personal growth.

items.title: Integrated Therapy
items.description: In integrated therapy, we combine different therapeutic approaches, adapting to the individual needs and preferences of the client. Career counseling helps clients identify career goals and make informed career decisions.

items.title: Psychological Consultation
items.description: Our psychological consultation enables understanding and coping with various life challenges. Through mentoring/coaching, we support clients in achieving personal and professional goals.

items.title: Dietetic Consultation
items.description: Our dietetic consultation provides professional assistance in healthy eating and weight management. Therapeutic body work allows clients to discover and process trauma through mindfulness of the body and its sensations.

items.title: PTSD Therapy (Eye Movement Desensitization and Reprocessing - EMDR)
items.description: PTSD therapy using EMDR provides effective tools for coping with post-traumatic stress disorder symptoms. Art therapy enables expression and processing of emotions through art and creative activities.

items.title: Animal-Assisted Therapy
items.description: Animal-assisted therapy utilizes interaction with animals to promote mental and emotional health. We also offer home-based psychotherapy, providing convenience and accessibility of therapy for individuals with limited mobility.

intro_bottom.title: Group Therapy
intro_bottom.description1: Our group therapy provides emotional support and the opportunity to share experiences with individuals facing similar challenges.
intro_bottom.description2: We also specialize in therapy for burnout, providing tools to cope with stress and restore life balance.

diagnosis.title: Diagnoses
diagnosis.description1: We offer various diagnoses and certificates related to mental health. We conduct diagnoses of autism and Asperger's syndrome, providing precise and comprehensive assessments of mental health.
diagnosis.description2: Our assessments are based on international diagnostic standards, taking into account each patient's individual characteristics and life context.
diagnosis.description3: This allows us to provide personalized therapeutic recommendations and support.

items.title: ADHD Diagnosis
items.description: We also diagnose ADHD, identifying and describing specific characteristics and symptoms of this disorder. Our diagnoses are based on a thorough clinical interview, behavioral observations, and standardized psychological tests, enabling accurate assessment of therapeutic and educational needs of individuals with ADHD.

items.title: Personality Diagnosis (Disorders) / MMPI
items.description: For individuals suspected of personality disorders, we conduct examinations, including psychological tests such as the Minnesota Multiphasic Personality Inventory (MMPI) and various methods of personality diagnosis. Our diagnoses are comprehensive and take into account both personality traits and the psychosocial functioning of the patient.

items.title: Child Psychological Diagnosis
items.description: We also specialize in diagnosing children, providing psychological diagnoses for children and PTSD diagnoses in adults and children, using standard diagnostic criteria from the DSM-5. Our assessments consider various aspects of the child's functioning, including emotional development, adaptive behaviors, and relationships with the environment.

items.title: Diagnosis of Psychological Disorders (Depression, Bipolar Disorder, Schizophrenia, etc.)
items.description: We also diagnose psychological disorders such as depression, bipolar disorder (i.e., bipolar affective disorder), or schizophrenia, based on observations, psychological tests, and clinical interviews. Our diagnoses are based on the latest research and clinical guidelines, ensuring the accuracy and reliability of our assessments.

items.title: Certificates of Disability
items.description: In addition to diagnoses, we also provide certificates of disability and other documents confirming disability, mental disorders, or illnesses, providing support and documentation necessary for applying for benefits and social assistance. Our certificates comply with applicable legal regulations and take into account the individual needs and life situation of each patient.
